alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 17 at 10:20AM CST until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove affecting Leake County. Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. Yockanookany River Near Ofahoma affecting Leake County. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Near Carthage. * WHEN...From Sunday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Widespread flooding of lowlands upstream and downstream of the State Highway 35 bridge is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CST Saturday the stage was 15.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue rising to a crest of 19.0 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Pearl River Carthage 17.0 15.5 Sat 7 am CST 17.1 18.7 18.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Saturday evening.
